message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a fair 40% of the pie. Accept and we can split the cash!
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, given the potential for inflation.  Let's get this done!
Not quite yet, Bob! I'm not willing to give up 60% of the pie. I'll make a new offer in Round 3.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. 55% for me, 45% for you. It's a fair split, and we can finally split the cash!
